Header: 30 trains will be operated by Monday
Content: State Minister Ashok Abeysinghe says that 30 trains will be operated by Monday. State Minister Ashok Abeysinghe said that they expect to operate 30 trains on Monday as double trains which means doubling the capacity of the passengers who would travel in those trains. He said that the trade union activists have requested for a discussion with the Salaries Commission. The State Minister said that they were asked to end the strike and come for discussions.
